welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Nailsea, UK! Nestled in the rolling hills of Somerset, our charming town is known for its picturesque landscapes, friendly locals, and rich history. We invite you to soak in the sights and immerse yourself in our unique culture. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bristol Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Bristol Airport is used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cardiff Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yeovilton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Yeovilton Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
